Title: I Want to Love You Until the Day I Die
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Joe Fazzio, Sarah L. Thompson (executive story editor), Daniel Robinson (story editor), Matthew Cruz (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Rome Flynn
Plot: In the explosive winter finale, Connor and Oliver's big wedding day has arrived, but there's murder in the air; and the mystery of who the unlucky victim is will be revealed.
